rules.title: Community rules
rules.subtitle: These rules keep the community helpful, safe, and welcoming

respect.title: Be respectful
respect.desc: Debate ideas, not people. No insults, hate speech, or discrimination.

noHarassment.title: No harassment
noHarassment.desc: Do not threaten, bully, or target individuals or groups.

noSpam.title: No spam or self-promo
noSpam.desc: No repeated ads, scams, or irrelevant links. Use the right categories.

noIllegal.title: No illegal content
noIllegal.desc: Do not post illegal, dangerous, or violent content, or instructions for harm.

privacy.title: Protect privacy
privacy.desc: Do not share personal data of others without consent.

safety.title: Safety first
safety.desc: No explicit sexual content, gore, or content endangering others.

minors.title: Protect minors
minors.desc: Any sexualized content involving minors is strictly banned.

misinfo.title: No harmful misinformation
misinfo.desc: Flag rumors and cite sources when making factual claims.

languages.title: Languages
languages.desc: French, Malagasy, and English are welcome. Be clear and respectful.

moderation.title: Follow moderation
moderation.desc: Moderators may edit, hide, or remove content and apply sanctions.

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.desc: Actions include warnings, content removal, temporary or permanent bans.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to get you started

q1.q: How do I create a post?
q1.a: Go to Community and click Create Post. Add a title, content, and optional images.

q2.a: Up to 4 images are displayed per post, each up to 5MB. Use JPG or PNG.

q3.q: How do I report a post?
q3.a: Use the three-dot menu on the post or comment and choose Report.

q4.a: Open the language switcher in the header and select your language.

q5.a: You control visibility in Settings. Basic info remains visible to moderators.

q6.a: Yes. Use the three-dot menu on your post to delete it.

q7.a: Use Chat to send private messages to other members.

q8.a: Use the Forgot Password link on the login page when available.

guide.title: Publishing guide
guide.subtitle: Clear, helpful, and respectful posts get more engagement

basics.title: Basics
basics.t1: Use a clear title that summarizes your topic.
basics.t2: Structure your post with short paragraphs and lists.
basics.t3: Cite sources for facts or statistics.
basics.t4: Tag your post with the right category.

media.title: Media
media.t1: Up to 4 images are shown; a +N badge appears if there are more.
media.t2: Max size 5MB per image. Prefer 1200Ã—800 or similar.
media.t3: Avoid watermarks or copyrighted images you do not own.
media.t4: Add alt text when possible for accessibility.
